title: Riot Screw You Over? (vaseline needed?)
body: So me and a few friends are missing some champions/skins I've no emails of anything saying why I lost my champs/skins and I've noticed that its only my gifted skins/champs if anyone has some advice on something I can do I wrote a support ticket but idk if this is happening to anyone else please let me know one of my friend was gifted a champ but he bought all of his own skins....... >.>(Please comment bellow)

replies.body:
I took a look at your account so I could figure out what happened with those champions and skins. It looks like your friend's account may have been compromised since there was a chargeback issued from his bank for those purchases. When that happens, we go through and reverse all of those fraudulent transactions and return the money used to him. 

I can't go into too much detail since I don't want to give out any of your personal info, but wait for a response in your [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go into more in-depth there!
Thank you it means a lot that you went out of your way to respond it helps that you cleared some things up for us
actually yes you are not alone brother i've  been a customer for 4-5 years and am now suspended riot dont care about us they only care about money. god speed stranger
Gifted a champ and bought my skins with my money isn't it kind of funny I don't get any notification they take my champion away and don't refund my skins hmm?

Riot Also did the samething to me @Mortis Deus I dont understand how they can take a gift away from me without informing me of the action at hand i need help and riot will not get back to me i think i need to seek legal action.
